titles.title: To prohibit the transfer of a firearm to, and the possession of a firearm by, a person who is intoxicated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit the transfer of a firearm to, and possession of a firearm by, a person who is intoxicated. Mandates that the statement from the transferee to transferor required by such Act specify that the transferee is not intoxicated.
